convenience@add jacket potato for a complete meal
subtitle: This subtle combination of leeks, plaice and prawns work well together.

method.text: Season fish fillets and fold them in half lengthways. Arrange in greased ovenproof dish and pour over wine.
Cover with foil and bake for 15 - 20 min or until fish flakes easily.
Strain off cooking liquid and pour into frying pan. Add leeks and prawns and heat through. Pour this mixture over fillets and sprinkle with paprika. Serve hot.

title: Seafood with leeks
